TRAIN_TYPE = #{trainType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRAIN_START_TIME = #{trainStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRAIN_STOP_TIME = #{trainStopTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRAINING_CATEGORY = #{trainingCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

IS_EMPLOYMENT_DESIRE = #{isEmploymentDesire,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMPLOYMENT_INTENTION = #{employmentIntention,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

EMPLOYMENT_CONSULTATION = #{employmentConsultation,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

OTHER_POLICIES = #{otherPolicies,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
